message: Let's split the money 70/30. It's fair and reasonable.
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more for taking the risk of negotiating with you!
I propose an equal split. We both contribute equally to the negotiation process, so it's only fair we receive the same amount.
You're being too greedy, Alice. I'm willing to give you a tiny share, but you need to be realistic about what I'm willing to give up.
I think a 60/40 split would be fair. It takes into account the risk you took in proposing the division and the value of your time.
You're pushing your luck, Alice. I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. This is my final offer.
